channel.title: Chating is gone
channel.description: ok so i had my my server up and my little brother deleted parts of my client and emptied my recycling bin just to piss me off could someone tell my how to make it so you can send and see the text that is sent on it such as "person: hello"

item.title: Chating is gone
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“noobspure50, post:17, topic:319484”][quote author=demonnd link=topic=415947.msg3061145#msg3061145 date=1260853445]

… i had a backup but it got deleted im not a retard i back my shit up XD

If it’s Backed up, Don’t come on here bitching
And people are offering you help, and your replying with shit like
“…and yo expect me to re add everything i did how about not”
If your not going to work toward it, Don’t come here Complaining.

1.im not “bitching” you would know if i was not to mention that last comment wasnt anything bad i wasnt “bitching” then
2.if you werent a fucktard you would have read that my backup got deleted
3.i am working on this so i am doing things on my part
4.i know people are trying to help me
5.if you had any clue who i am then i only come here if i tried already
6.and final i admit i was a retard a retard for posting in moparscape…
[/quote]
how about stop being a jerk, and start over :)[/quote]No, it’s starting to be interesting! ;D

item.description:

item.title: Chating is gone
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

the problem is of when i edited my client for the first time it was horribly messy never got round to fully cleaning it so i posted this asking for simply how to send a message and it get received and have it show to every one (isn’t it like string x)??
again no face intended

Read full topic

item.title: Chating is gone
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

If you don’t know exactly what all he deleted, you are just going to have to start over, or go off of your back-up if you have one.
For the chat system though, re-download whatever base you used, and C+P the entire code for the chat system into your source files.
Make sure you make regular back-ups from now on.

Read full topic
